definitions.definition: A device or object that works by the operation of steam .

subdefinitions.definition: A vessel in which articles are subjected to the action of steam, as in washing and in various processes of manufacture .
( cooking ) A cooking appliance that cooks by steaming.
( obsolete ) A steam fire engine , that is, a steam boiler and engine driving a pump , which are all mounted on wheels .

definitions.definition: A mode of transportation propelled by steam.

subdefinitions.definition: A steam-powered road locomotive ; a traction engine .
( nautical ) A vessel propelled by steam; a steamboat or steamship .

definitions.definition: A wetsuit with long sleeves and legs .

subdefinitions.definition: ( Maine ) The soft-shell clam , sand gaper , or long-neck clam ( Mya arenaria ), an edible saltwater clam ; specifically the clam when steamed for eating .
A steamer duck : any of the four species of the duck genus Tachyeres which are all found in South America , three of which are flightless .

definitions.definition: ( horse racing ) A racehorse the odds of which are becoming shorter (that is, decreasing) because bettors are backing it.
( British , slang ) An act of fellatio .
( British , crime , slang ) A member of a youth gang who engages in steaming ( robbing and escaping in a large group).
( British , Scotland , slang ) A drinking session .

( Australia , obsolete ) A dish made by cooking diced meat very slowly in a tightly sealed pot with a minimum of flavourings , allowing it to steam in its own juices ; specifically such a dish made with kangaroo meat. [ c. 1850 – 1900s.]
( chiefly in the plural , Rhode Island ) A steamed clam .
( Memphis , hip-hop , slang ) A stolen vehicle.

subdefinitions.definition: A gullible or easily cheated person.

definitions.definition: A homosexual man with a preference for passive partners .
a gambler who increases a wager after losing .

secondary_definitions: ( British , slang ) A homosexual man with a preference for passive partners .
( US , slang ) a gambler who increases a wager after losing .
